Name: Wild West Old Sam
About the game: Once in the Wild West Sam and his gang are planning a big heist. The heist goes as planned, but the other members of the gang betray Sam by making a deal with the feds. Can Sam survive this relentless journey to protect his wife and child while also seeking revenge? Are you ready to be thrown into the fires with treacherous gang members and self-seeking townspeople? You will continue on your way through a conspiracy full of greed and vengeance. A fun TPS experience awaits you. WWO SAM takes you to a brutal conflict in the wild west with its impressive story. You have the biggest role in avenging Sam by making tough decisions. You can face all kinds of intrigue and betrayal in this adventure. It offers a different experience in the wild west world with its custom-made music. Prepare for the good and the worse.
